name: scenario
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: scenario
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a description of possible actions or events in the future

example.egtrans: 有几种可能出现的局面。

example.eg: a horrific/nightmare scenario such as a Third World War
example.egtrans: 可怕的／梦魇般的设想，如第三次世界大战

dsense.name: scenario
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a written plan of the characters and events in a play or film
trans_examp.trans_cn: 剧本提纲；剧情梗概；电影脚本
